scripts.bootstrap: npx lerna bootstrap && npm run stub-dev-deployments && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run kill-ports && REACT_APP_HARDHAT_FORK=mainnet HARDHAT_FORK=mainnet npx lerna run --ignore @goldfinch-eng/client2 start --parallel
scripts.start:local: npm run kill-ports && REACT_APP_HARDHAT_FORK= HARDHAT_FORK= npx lerna run --ignore @goldfinch-eng/client2 start --parallel
scripts.start:local:liquidity-mining: npx lerna run --ignore @goldfinch-eng/client2 generate-merkle-root:local && REACT_APP_GCLOUD_FUNCTIONS_URL=http://localhost:5001/goldfinch-frontends-dev/us-central1 BACKER_MERKLE_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/backerMerkleDistributor/merkleDistributorInfo.dev.json BACKER_MERKLE_DIRECT_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/backerMerkleDirectDistributor/merkleDirectDistributorInfo.dev.json MERKLE_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/merkleDistributor/merkleDistributorInfo.dev.json MERKLE_DIRECT_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/merkleDirectDistributor/merkleDirectDistributorInfo.dev.json npm run start:local
scripts.start:murmuration: npm run kill-ports && npx lerna run --ignore @goldfinch-eng/client2 start:murmuration --parallel
scripts.start:murmuration:liquidity-mining: npm run kill-ports && npx lerna run --ignore @goldfinch-eng/client2 generate-merkle-root:murmuration && BACKER_MERKLE_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/backerMerkleDistributor/merkleDistributorInfo.dev.json BACKER_MERKLE_DIRECT_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/backerMerkleDirectDistributor/merkleDirectDistributorInfo.dev.json && MERKLE_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/merkleDistributor/merkleDistributorInfo.dev.json MERKLE_DIRECT_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/merkleDirectDistributor/merkleDirectDistributorInfo.dev.json npx lerna run --ignore @goldfinch-eng/client2 start:murmuration:liquidity-mining --parallel
scripts.kill-ports: for i in 4000 4001 3000 3002 5001 8545 8080; do lsof -t -i:$i | xargs -r kill; done
scripts.build: npx lerna run --ignore @goldfinch-eng/client2 build --stream --scope @goldfinch-eng/protocol && npx lerna run --ignore @goldfinch-eng/client2 build --stream --ignore @goldfinch-eng/protocol
